item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: We went to a (co-ed) baby shower for our friends Steve (Biff) and Renuka at Raynu & Paul's house. Gay won "gourmet soap" playing a baby name game. The food (flank steak and salmon) was yummy. Raynu & Paul's house is very well-decorated and motivates me to start decorating our house we've been in for two years now with barely a picture on a wall. We got them a baby car seat, a Pittsburgh Steelers bib that reads "Little Steelers Fan" and a Steelers baby bottle. Biff is a big Steelers fan and, coincidentally, I was too for years until I moved to Seattle and can't get Steeler games on TV. Then we had to hurry and leave to catch the 11:30pm ferry back to Vashon. It seems like we're always rushing to catch a ferry.
